diff_act: 3.flash a green light on the control panel
5.provide an error message to the controller

regen.absent_element: handling of call disconnection or termination
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide an audible and visual indication to the driver when a call is disconnected or terminated and remove the call from the loudspeaker.

label: If the system is not able to connect the call, an audible and visual indication shall be provided to the driver that the call was not received by the controller.
